message: Seems to be a lot of activity (eg. thousands of posts in the forum). Do you plan to monetize it with ads?
Some context from the website: "We offer instructional World of Warcraft PVP videos, articles, and answers from the best players in the world."
Interesting idea, and I like the design
I should mention that the site is about a year old. It's a project myself and 3 other Virginia Tech students started.
No plans for ads in the forums at the moment
So, what are your plans to make money with this?
Are you people actually buying access to your videos?
@jonas3d I'm not sure I understand your question
@loganlinn As in, is this actually working?  Are you making money from your videos?
Presumably the income comes from the 12,827 odd users already paying a subscription?
@jonas3d Wow sorry for the late respond, been busy pushing changes to the site :) Yes, people love our service!

Site looks good.  Noticed a few very minor things - you've still got an alert on the registration page, and Disccusion should be spelled "Discussion".  If people love you, and they're paying you, I'd say you're doing pretty darn well!

Pretty impressive you guys turned this into a business, I would have assumed it was too niche, despite the huge number of WoW players.  Are there any trademark issues with Blizzard associated with this kind of service?
